name: WP GitHub Gist Block WordPress Development Environment

postAttachCommand.installWP: while ! wp db check --path=/var/www/html; do sleep 5; done; wp core is-installed --path=/var/www/html || wp core install --url="http://localhost:8080" --title="WP GitHub Gist Block Test Site" --admin_user=local --admin_password=local --admin_email=local@example.com --path=/var/www/html
postAttachCommand.nodeInstall: cd /var/www/html/wp-content/plugins/wp-github-gist-block && npm ci && npm run build
